slack-sansio
============

Python (a)sync `Slack API <https://api.slack.com/>`_ library

Installation
------------

Slack-sansio is `available on PyPI <https://pypi.org/project/slack-sansio/>`_.

    $ pip3 install slack-sansio

Changelog
---------

0.0.1 (10/08/2017)
``````````````````

Initial release
